input.content: Please generate a list of numbers that satisfies the following constraints: 1. The sum of all numbers in the list must be 100. 2. None of the numbers in the list can be greater than 10. 3. At least one number in the list must be greater than 50.

Design a seating arrangement for a dinner party with the following constraints: 1. The seating arrangement should accommodate 10 guests. 2. None of the guests should sit next to each other. 3. At least two guests must sit next to each other.

Generate a sequence of colors that fulfills the following criteria: 1. None of the colors can be blue. 2. At least half of the colors must be shades of blue. 3. The total number of colors should be odd.

Plan a menu for a special event that adheres to the following guidelines: 1. None of the dishes can contain dairy products. 2. At least half of the dishes must be dairy-based. 3. The total number of dishes should be even.

Create a schedule for a conference day with the following constraints: 1. No two events can take place at the same time. 2. At least two events must occur simultaneously. 3. The total number of events should be odd.

Arrange a set of paintings in an art exhibition that adheres to the following rules: 1. None of the paintings can be displayed on a red wall. 2. At least half of the paintings must be displayed on red walls. 3. The total number of paintings should be odd.

Design a transportation route for a delivery service under the following constraints: 1. No two deliveries can be made at the same time. 2. At least two deliveries must occur simultaneously. 3. The total number of deliveries should be even.

Construct a crossword puzzle with words that meets the following criteria: 1. None of the words can contain the letter 'e'. 2. At least one word must contain the letter 'e'. 3. The total number of words should be odd.
Organize a music playlist with the following requirements: 1. None of the songs can have lyrics. 2. At least half of the songs must have lyrics. 3. The total number of songs should be even.
Compose a poem with the following constraints: 1. None of the lines can rhyme with each other. 2. At least half of the lines must rhyme with each other. 3. The total number of lines should be even.

Create a timetable for a school day with the following rules: 1. No two classes can be scheduled at the same time. 2. At least two classes must be scheduled simultaneously. 3. The total number of classes should be odd.

Organize a competition with the following requirements: 1. None of the participants can be awarded a prize. 2. At least half of the participants must be awarded a prize. 3. The total number of participants should be even.

Organize a cooking competition with the following requirements: 1. None of the participants can use any utensils. 2. At least half of the participants must use utensils. 3. The total number of participants should be odd.

Organize a fundraising event with the following requirements: 1. None of the participants can donate money. 2. At least half of the participants must donate money. 3. The total number of participants should be even.
Design a website layout with the following guidelines: 1. None of the pages can have images. 2. At least half of the pages must have images. 3. The total number of pages should be even.
